inclusion.criterion: Residence in the study area and intention to stay in the area for the duration of the
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aged at least 16 years (pregnant adolescents younger than 16 years will be considered only if they are accompanied by a responsible adult (in the Gambia) or married)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide biological samples as and when required during the study period (blood and placental biopsy)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A history of sensitivity to sulphonamides.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Already participating in another research study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 67-year-old healthy woman with no underlying disease, menopausal and has 4 children.
